            <string language="en-US">20th Century Philosophical Movements</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A 20. századi filozófiai irányzatok a nyelv problematikája felől.</string>
            <string language="en-US">The 20. century philosophical tendencies from the problems of the language.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Die 20. philosophischen Tendenzen des Jahrhunderts
von den Problemen der Sprache.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les 20. tendances philosophiques de siècle des 
problèmes du langage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As 20. tendências filosóficas do século dos

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le 20. tendenze filosofiche di secolo dai

          </description>

          </description>
